testcase.name: testJsonToXmlTransformation
testcase.system-out:
Linking top level mapping to virtual root : Organization Adding child mapping to parent: CompanyInfo -> Organization Adding child mapping to parent: CName -> CompanyInfo Adding child mapping to parent: YearFounded -> CompanyInfo Adding child mapping to parent: IsPublic -> CompanyInfo Adding child mapping to parent: Departments -> Organization Adding child mapping to parent: Department -> Departments Adding child mapping to parent: DepartmentID -> Department Adding child mapping to parent: DepartmentName -> Department Adding child mapping to parent: HeadCount -> Department Adding child mapping to parent: Status -> Department Adding child mapping to parent: Employees -> Organization Adding child mapping to parent: Employee -> Employees Adding child mapping to parent: EmployeeID -> Employee Adding child mapping to parent: FullName -> Employee
--- Sorted Mapping Hierarchy --- Mapping: Root Mapping: Organization Mapping: CompanyInfo Mapping: CName Mapping: YearFounded Mapping: IsPublic Mapping: Departments [COLLECTOR: $.company.mainDepartments[*], $.company.satelliteOffices.departments[*]] Mapping: Department Mapping: DepartmentID Mapping: DepartmentName Mapping: HeadCount Mapping: Status [DERIVED: if active exists, value=Active] Mapping: Employees [COLLECTOR: $.company.staffDirectory[*], $.company] Mapping: Employee Mapping: EmployeeID Mapping: FullName ------------------------------
XML file created successfully!
